page.title: 13TRANSPORT IN KILMARNOCK
page.content: We questioned 100 people about Transport and these are the results. 67% of the people preferred to travel by car, 27% by bus, 2% by motor-bike and 4% preferred to walk. 30% of the people did not own a car, 53% owned 1 car, 15% owned 2 cars and 1% owned 4 cars. Ford was the most popular make of car, Renault was second and Vauxhall was third. The most popular colour was red, then blue and then yellow. 65% of people used their car to get to work. All the rest either used the bus, train, bicycle, motor-bike or else they walked. 71% thought the New Farm bus service was good, 17% thought it was bad and 12% didn't know because they never used it.In the last month 18% travelled by train and 44% have travelled by taxi. 25% have travelled by plane in the last year.
